messageExample.Model:
@greaterThanEqualTo({fieldName:'age'  ,message:'Please enter number greater than or equal to 1.' }) 
otherAge: number;

complete.Html:
If you want to apply conditional validation on 'Voter Age' or 'Member Age' then need to add this input greater than or equal to '18'.
